allowance.translate: допуск, разрешение, довольствие, выдавать паек, выдавать содержание
examples: His father gives him a monthly allowance of £200.
a monthly allowance for household expenses
His allowance was a quarter a week.
I am allowanced two glasses three hours before dinner.

A child's allowance should not be too generous.

The father is withholding the allowance until the son cleans his room.
the recommended daily allowance of vitamin C
Hereafter you will no longer receive an allowance.

His usual allowance was sixteen cups of tea, all of heroic strength.

An additional charge is made on baggage exceeding the weight allowance.
